class.name: LuaObject
class.brief_description: Base class for all Lua objects in GDScript, except LuaState.
class.description: The LuaObject class provides methods to access the associated Lua state and retrieve object pointers. This class serves as the foundation for interacting with Lua objects from GDScript. It allows you to: - Get the Lua state associated with the object - Retrieve the pointer value of the Lua object

method.name: get_lua_state
method.description: Returns the LuaState associated with this Lua object.

method.name: get_pointer_value
method.description: Returns the pointer value of the Lua object as an integer.
